sql.isNotEmpty: u.FROM_BILL_ID in (select a.ADVC_ORDER_ID from DRP_ADVC_ORDER a left join DRP_ADVC_ORDER b on a.FROM_BILL_ID=b.ADVC_ORDER_ID where b.CONTRACT_NO like '%'||#CONTRACT_NO#||'%' and b.DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG#)

sqlMap.sql: select u.STOREIN_ID, u.STOREIN_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_ID, u.SEND_CHANN_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, u.STOREIN_STORE_ID, u.STOREIN_STORE_NO, u.STOREIN_STORE_NAME, u.STORAGE_FLAG, u.REMARK, u.DEAL_FLAG, to_char(u.DEAL_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DEAL_TIME, u.DEAL_PSON_ID, u.DEAL_PSON_NAME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_STOREIN u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM DRP_STOREIN u
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_STOREIN
DEAL_FLAG = #DEAL_FLAG# DEAL_TIME = sysdate DEAL_PSON_ID = #DEAL_PSON_ID# DEAL_PSON_NAME = #DEAL_PSON_NAME# STATE = #STATE# SALE_PSON_ID = #SALE_PSON_ID# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPD_TIME = sysdate
where STOREIN_ID = #STOREIN_ID#
sqlMap.select: select u.STOREIN_ID, u.STOREIN_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_ID, u.SEND_CHANN_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, u.STOREIN_STORE_ID, u.STOREIN_STORE_NO, u.STOREIN_STORE_NAME, u.STORAGE_FLAG, u.REMARK, u.DEAL_FLAG, to_char(u.DEAL_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DEAL_TIME, u.DEAL_PSON_ID, u.DEAL_PSON_NAME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, u.ORDER_CHANN_ID, u.ORDER_CHANN_NO, u.ORDER_CHANN_NAME, to_char(u.STATEMENUT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') STATEMENUT_DATE from DRP_STOREIN u where u.STOREIN_ID = #STOREIN_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select u.STOREIN_DTL_ID, u.STOREIN_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.NOTICE_NUM, u.REAL_NUM, u.REMARK, u.PRICE, u.DECT_RATE, u.DECT_PRICE, u.DECT_AMOUNT, u.DEL_FLAG, u.INS_FLAG, (select STOREIN_STORE_ID from DRP_STOREIN where STOREIN_ID = u.STOREIN_ID) STOREIN_STORE_ID, a.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, u.SPCL_TECH_ID, u.SALE_ORDER_ID, u.SALE_ORDER_NO, u.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID, u.GOODS_ORDER_NO, a.SPCL_SPEC_REMARK, a.DM_SPCL_TECH_NO from DRP_STOREIN_DTL u left join DRP_SPCL_TECH a on u.SPCL_TECH_ID = a.SPCL_TECH_ID
sqlMap.insert:
insert into DRP_STOREIN_DTL( STOREIN_DTL_ID, STOREIN_ID, PRD_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, PRD_COLOR, BRAND, STD_UNIT, NOTICE_NUM, REAL_NUM, PRICE, DECT_RATE, DECT_PRICE, DECT_AMOUNT, DEL_FLAG, YEAR_MONTH, INS_FLAG, FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, SPCL_TECH_ID, SALE_ORDER_ID, SALE_ORDER_NO, SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID, GOODS_ORDER_NO )values( #STOREIN_DTL_ID#, #STOREIN_ID#, #PRD_ID#, #PRD_NO#, #PRD_NAME#, #PRD_SPEC#, #PRD_COLOR#, #BRAND#, #STD_UNIT#, #NOTICE_NUM#, #REAL_NUM#, #PRICE#, #DECT_RATE#, #DECT_PRICE#, #DECT_AMOUNT#, #DEL_FLAG#, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM'), #INS_FLAG#, #FROM_BILL_DTL_ID#, #SPCL_TECH_ID#, #SALE_ORDER_ID#, #SALE_ORDER_NO#, #SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID#, #GOODS_ORDER_NO#
)
sqlMap.update: update DRP_STOREIN_DTL set REAL_NUM = #REAL_NUM# where STOREIN_DTL_ID = #STOREIN_DTL_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_STOREIN_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where STOREIN_DTL_ID in ($STOREIN_DTL_IDS$)
update DRP_STOREIN_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where STOREIN_ID = #STOREIN_ID:VARCHAR#
update DRP_STOREIN set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# ,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME# ,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR# ,UPD_TIME=sysdate where STOREIN_ID = #STOREIN_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.sql: select u.STOREIN_STORG_DTL_ID, u.STOREIN_DTL_ID, u.STOREIN_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.STORG_ID, u.STORG_NO, u.STORG_NAME, u.REAL_NUM, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_STOREIN_STORG_DTL u
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_STOREIN_STORG_DTL( STOREIN_STORG_DTL_ID, STOREIN_DTL_ID, STOREIN_ID, PRD_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, PRD_COLOR, BRAND, STD_UNIT, STORG_ID, STORG_NO, STORG_NAME, REAL_NUM, DEL_FLAG, YEAR_MONTH )values( #STOREIN_STORG_DTL_ID#, #STOREIN_DTL_ID#, #STOREIN_ID#, #PRD_ID#, #PRD_NO#, #PRD_NAME#, #PRD_SPEC#, #PRD_COLOR#, #BRAND#, #STD_UNIT#, #STORG_ID#, #STORG_NO#, #STORG_NAME#, #REAL_NUM#, #DEL_FLAG#, to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMM') )
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_STOREIN_STORG_DTL
STORG_ID = #STORG_ID# STORG_NO = #STORG_NO# STORG_NAME = #STORG_NAME# REAL_NUM = #REAL_NUM#
where STOREIN_STORG_DTL_ID = #STOREIN_STORG_DTL_ID#
update DRP_STOREIN_DTL set REAL_NUM =( select sum(REAL_NUM) from DRP_STOREIN_STORG_DTL where STOREIN_DTL_ID=#STOREIN_DTL_ID# and DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG# ) where STOREIN_DTL_ID=#STOREIN_DTL_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_STOREIN_STORG_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where STOREIN_STORG_DTL_ID in ($STOREIN_STORG_DTL_IDS$)
update DRP_STOREIN_STORG_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where STOREIN_DTL_ID = #STOREIN_DTL_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.STORAGE_FLAG, nvl((select sum(REAL_NUM) from DRP_STOREIN_DTL where STOREIN_ID = u.STOREIN_ID and DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG#), 0) STOREIN_DTL_SUM, (select count(0) from DRP_STOREIN_STORG_DTL where STOREIN_ID = u.STOREIN_ID and DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG#) STOREIN_NOTICE_DTL_CON, STOREIN_STORE_ID from DRP_STOREIN u where u.STOREIN_ID = #STOREIN_ID# and u.DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG#
select BASE_PRICE PRICE,DECT_RATE ,DECT_PRICE from BASE_AREA_DSCT_FLAT a left join BASE_CHANN b on a.AREA_ID=b.AREA_ID where PRD_ID=#PRD_ID# and b.CHANN_ID=#CHANN_ID#
select STOREIN_STORG_DTL_ID from DRP_STOREIN_STORG_DTL where STOREIN_DTL_ID in ($STOREIN_DTL_IDS$);
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_STOREIN_DIFF( STOREIN_DIFF_ID, STOREIN_DIFF_NO, BILL_TYPE, FROM_BILL_ID, FROM_BILL_NO, SEND_CHANN_ID, SEND_CHANN_NO, SEND_CHANN_NAME, RECV_CHANN_ID, RECV_CHANN_NO, RECV_CHANN_NAME, STOREIN_STORE_ID, STOREIN_STORE_NO, STOREIN_STORE_NAME, STATE, REMARK, CREATOR, CRE_NAME, CRE_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, DEL_FLAG, ORDER_CHANN_ID, ORDER_CHANN_NO, ORDER_CHANN_NAME )values( #STOREIN_DIFF_ID#, #STOREIN_DIFF_NO#, #BILL_TYPE#, #FROM_BILL_ID#, #FROM_BILL_NO#, #SEND_CHANN_ID#, #SEND_CHANN_NO#, #SEND_CHANN_NAME#, #RECV_CHANN_ID#, #RECV_CHANN_NO#, #RECV_CHANN_NAME#, #STOREIN_STORE_ID#, #STOREIN_STORE_NO#, #STOREIN_STORE_NAME#, #STATE#, #REMARK#, #CREATOR#, #CRE_NAME#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #DEL_FLAG#, #ORDER_CHANN_ID#, #ORDER_CHANN_NO#, #ORDER_CHANN_NAME# )

insert into DRP_STOREIN_DIFF_DTL( STOREIN_DIFF_DTL_ID, STOREIN_DIFF_ID, PRD_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, PRD_COLOR, BRAND, STD_UNIT, NOTICE_NUM, REAL_NUM, PRICE, DECT_RATE, DECT_PRICE, DIFF_NUM, DIFF_AMOUNT, DEL_FLAG, FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, SPCL_TECH_ID, SALE_ORDER_ID, SALE_ORDER_NO, SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID, GOODS_ORDER_NO )values( #STOREIN_DIFF_DTL_ID#, #STOREIN_DIFF_ID#, #PRD_ID#, #PRD_NO#, #PRD_NAME#, #PRD_SPEC#, #PRD_COLOR#, #BRAND#, #STD_UNIT#, #NOTICE_NUM#, #REAL_NUM#, #PRICE#, #DECT_RATE#, #DECT_PRICE#, #DIFF_NUM#, #DIFF_AMOUNT#, #DEL_FLAG#, #FROM_BILL_DTL_ID#, #SPCL_TECH_ID#, #SALE_ORDER_ID#, #SALE_ORDER_NO#, #SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID#, #GOODS_ORDER_NO# )

insert into DRP_STOREIN( STOREIN_ID, STOREIN_NO, BILL_TYPE, FROM_BILL_ID, FROM_BILL_NO, SEND_CHANN_ID, SEND_CHANN_NO, SEND_CHANN_NAME, RECV_CHANN_ID, RECV_CHANN_NO, RECV_CHANN_NAME, ORDER_CHANN_ID, ORDER_CHANN_NO, ORDER_CHANN_NAME, STOREIN_STORE_ID, STOREIN_STORE_NO, STOREIN_STORE_NAME, STORAGE_FLAG, STATE, REMARK, CREATOR, CRE_NAME, CRE_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, DEL_FLAG, YEAR_MONTH, STATEMENUT_DATE )values( #STOREIN_ID#, #STOREIN_NO#, #BILL_TYPE#, #FROM_BILL_ID#, #FROM_BILL_NO#, #SEND_CHANN_ID#, #SEND_CHANN_NO#, #SEND_CHANN_NAME#, #RECV_CHANN_ID#, #RECV_CHANN_NO#, #RECV_CHANN_NAME#, #ORDER_CHANN_ID#, #ORDER_CHANN_NO#, #ORDER_CHANN_NAME#, #STOREIN_STORE_ID#, #STOREIN_STORE_NO#, #STOREIN_STORE_NAME#, #STORAGE_FLAG#, #STATE#, #REMARK#, #CREATOR#, #CRE_NAME#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #DEL_FLAG#, sysdate, to_date(#STATEMENUT_DATE#,'yyyy-mm-dd') )
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_STOREIN_DTL
REAL_NUM = #REAL_NUM#
where STOREIN_DTL_ID = #STOREIN_DTL_ID# and STOREIN_ID = #STOREIN_ID#
sqlMap.select: select SN, PRD_ID from ERP_STOREOUT_DTL where SN = #SN#
select PRD_ID from DRP_STOREIN_DTL where PRD_ID = #PRD_ID#
sqlMap.update: update DRP_SPCL_TECH set TECH_NO_EDIT_FLAG=#TECH_NO_EDIT_FLAG# where SPCL_TECH_ID in (select SPCL_TECH_ID from DRP_STOREIN_DTL where DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG# and STOREIN_ID=#STOREIN_ID# and SPCL_TECH_ID is not null) and USE_FLAG=#USE_FLAG#
update DRP_ADVC_ORDER set STATE=#STATE# where ADVC_ORDER_ID=#FROM_BILL_ID#
update DRP_STOREIN_NOTICE set STATE=#STATE# where STOREIN_NOTICE_ID=#FROM_BILL_ID#
sqlMap.select: select u.STOREIN_ID, u.STOREIN_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_ID, u.SEND_CHANN_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, u.STOREIN_STORE_ID, u.STOREIN_STORE_NO, u.STOREIN_STORE_NAME, u.STORAGE_FLAG, u.REMARK, u.DEAL_FLAG, to_char(u.DEAL_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DEAL_TIME, u.DEAL_PSON_ID, u.DEAL_PSON_NAME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.REMARK, d.PRD_NO, d.PRD_NAME, d.PRD_SPEC, d.PRD_COLOR, d.BRAND, d.STD_UNIT, d.NOTICE_NUM, d.REAL_NUM, d.PRICE, d.DECT_RATE, d.DECT_PRICE, d.DECT_AMOUNT, c.SPCL_DTL_REMARK from DRP_STOREIN u left join DRP_STOREIN_DTL d on u.STOREIN_ID = d.STOREIN_ID left join DRP_SPCL_TECH c on c.SPCL_TECH_ID = d.SPCL_TECH_ID and c.USE_FLAG = 1 where u.DEL_FLAG=0 and d.DEL_FLAG = 0 and 1=1
sqlMap.update: update DRP_STOREIN_DTL a set REAL_NUM=0 where a.STOREIN_ID=#STOREIN_ID# and a.DEL_FLAG=0
